body: I read the raws and this story is so hot, entertaining, and magnetic. However, if you’re going to invest in following this, you should be warned that (spoiler) the ending is incredibly cruel and nihilistic. It is deeply a story about hating women—objectifying, exploiting, and destroying them. I read tons of trashy manhwa, but the deliberately vicious misogyny of this one actually kind of depressed me. It’s simultaneously a cathartic sadism fantasy (Kevin is so untouchably elite that he can never be hurt by a woman again) and a soulless tragedy (Kevin has no capacity to empathize or have any human connection with the people he victimizes). The horny content is amazing but the narrative’s destination is horribly bleak.
At least this mc is not looser like other Korean ntrwha
